{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Junk | class = Junk | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: {{Class|Meat}}→Junk
A decorative gib actor spawned by [[A_TossGib]] if called on a non-bleeding actor. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Junk : {{Class|Meat}} { States { Spawn: JUNK A 700 Stop JUNK B 700 Stop JUNK C 700 Stop JUNK D 700 Stop JUNK E 700 Stop JUNK F 700 Stop JUNK G 700 Stop JUNK H 700 Stop JUNK I 700 Stop JUNK J 700 Stop JUNK K 700 Stop JUNK L 700 Stop JUNK M 700 Stop JUNK N 700 Stop JUNK O 700 Stop JUNK P 700 Stop JUNK Q 700 Stop JUNK R 700 Stop JUNK S 700 Stop JUNK T 700 Stop } }
